sourcesContent:
Registrarse

{{ errorMessage }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AccountService } from '../services/account.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { user: any = {}; errorMessage: string = ''; constructor(private accountService: AccountService, private router: Router) { } register() { this.accountService.register(this.user).subscribe( response => { console.log('Registration successful'); this.router.navigate(['/']); }, error => { console.log('Registration failed', error); this.errorMessage = error.error.message || 'Registration failed'; } ); } }
